Protocols/GCCountryPickerDelegate.html#/.name: countryPickerDidCancel(_:)
Protocols/GCCountryPickerDelegate.html#/.abstract: Tells the delegate that the user cancelled the pick operation.

Protocols/GCCountryPickerDelegate.html#/.name: countryPicker(_:didSelectCountry:)
Protocols/GCCountryPickerDelegate.html#/.abstract: Tells the delegate that the user picked a country.

Protocols/GCCountryPickerDataSource.html.name: countryCodes(for:)
Protocols/GCCountryPickerDataSource.html.abstract: Asks the data source to provide a collection of ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country codes for the specified country picker view controller.

Protocols/GCCountryPickerDataSource.html.name: GCCountryPickerDataSource
Protocols/GCCountryPickerDataSource.html.abstract: The data source of a GCCountryPickerViewController object must adopt the GCCountryPickerDataSource protocol.

Protocols/GCCountryPickerDelegate.html.name: GCCountryPickerDelegate
Protocols/GCCountryPickerDelegate.html.abstract: The delegate of a GCCountryPickerViewController object must adopt the GCCountryPickerDelegate protocol.

Classes/GCCountry.html#/s:15GCCountryPic.name: countryCode
Classes/GCCountry.html#/s:15GCCountryPic.abstract: The ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code for the country.

Classes/GCCountry.html#/c:@M@GCCountryPi.name: localizedDisplayName
Classes/GCCountry.html#/c:@M@GCCountryPi.abstract: The localized display name for the country.

Classes/GCCountry.html#/s:15GCCountryPic.name: init(countryCode:)
Classes/GCCountry.html#/s:15GCCountryPic.abstract: Initializes and returns a newly allocated country.

Classes/GCCountryPickerViewController.ht.name: delegate
Classes/GCCountryPickerViewController.ht.abstract: The object that acts as the delegate of the country picker view controller.

Classes/GCCountryPickerViewController.ht.name: dataSource
Classes/GCCountryPickerViewController.ht.abstract: The object that acts as the data source of the country picker view controller.

Classes/GCCountryPickerViewController.ht.name: init(coder:)
Classes/GCCountryPickerViewController.ht.abstract: Returns an object initialized from data in a given unarchiver.

Classes/GCCountryPickerViewController.ht.name: init()
Classes/GCCountryPickerViewController.ht.abstract: Initializes and returns a newly allocated country picker view controller object.

Classes/GCCountryPickerViewController.ht.name: viewDidLoad()
Classes/GCCountryPickerViewController.ht.abstract: Called after the controller's view is loaded into memory.

Classes/GCCountryPickerViewController.ht.name: updateSearchResults(for:)
Classes/GCCountryPickerViewController.ht.abstract: Called when the search bar becomes the first responder or when the user makes changes inside the search bar.

Classes/GCCountryPickerViewController.ht.name: tableView(_:heightForHeaderInSection:)
Classes/GCCountryPickerViewController.ht.abstract: Asks the delegate for the height to use for the header of a particular section.

Classes/GCCountryPickerViewController.ht.name: tableView(_:viewForHeaderInSection:)
Classes/GCCountryPickerViewController.ht.abstract: Asks the delegate for a view object to display in the header of the specified section of the table view.

Classes/GCCountryPickerViewController.ht.name: tableView(_:didSelectRowAt:)
Classes/GCCountryPickerViewController.ht.abstract: Tells the delegate that the specified row is now selected.

Classes/GCCountryPickerViewController.ht.name: numberOfSections(in:)
Classes/GCCountryPickerViewController.ht.abstract: Asks the data source to return the number of sections in the table view.

Classes/GCCountryPickerViewController.ht.name: tableView(_:numberOfRowsInSection:)
Classes/GCCountryPickerViewController.ht.abstract: Tells the data source to return the number of rows in a given section of a table view.

Classes/GCCountryPickerViewController.ht.name: sectionIndexTitles(for:)
Classes/GCCountryPickerViewController.ht.abstract: Asks the data source to return the titles for the sections for a table view.

Classes/GCCountryPickerViewController.ht.name: tableView(_:sectionForSectionIndexTitle:at:)
Classes/GCCountryPickerViewController.ht.abstract: Asks the data source to return the index of the section having the given title and section title index.

Classes/GCCountryPickerViewController.ht.name: tableView(_:cellForRowAt:)
Classes/GCCountryPickerViewController.ht.abstract: Asks the data source for a cell to insert in a particular location of the table view.

Classes/GCCountryPickerViewController.ht.name: GCCountryPickerViewController
Classes/GCCountryPickerViewController.ht.abstract: The GCCountryPickerViewController class defines a view controller containing a country picker interface.

Classes/GCCountry.html.name: GCCountry
Classes/GCCountry.html.abstract: The GCCountry class defines an object that contains the ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 country code and localized display name for a country.
